mapper.select: SELECT SL_CTR_STRT_YM AS END_NM /*시작년월*/ , SL_CTR_END_YM AS RS_CD_NM /*종료년월*/ , SL_CTR_AMT /*매출조정금액*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SL_CTR_DV_CD', SL_CTR_DV_CD) AS SL_CTR_DV_CD_NM /*매출조정구분코드명 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SL_CTR_TP_CD', SL_CTR_TP_CD) AS SL_CTR_TP_CD_NM /*매출조정유형명*/ , SL_CTR_RMK_CN AS SL_CTR_RSON_NM /*매출조정사유명 */ , FST_RGST_DTM AS RGST_DT /*최초등록일시*/ , (SELECT USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M WHERE USR_ID = FST_RGST_USR_ID AND DEL_YN = 'N') AS RGR_NM , FST_RGST_USR_ID AS RGR_ID /*최초등록사용자ID*/ FROM TB_RVDW_SL_CTR_BAS WHERE SL_CTR_STRT_YM <= #{inqrYm} AND SL_CTR_END_YM >= #{inqrYm} AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
